# 문제 1
정규분포 pdf 값을 계산하는 자신만의 파이썬 함수를 정의하고, 정규분포 mu = 3, sigma = 2 의 pdf를 그릴 것.
scipy.stats 함수 사용 안하고 하기.

![정규분포 함수 식](././img/정규분포 식.png)

::: {#fc19e939 .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import numpy as np
import math
```
:::


::: {#842dbc54 .cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
def nomal_distribution_function(x, mu, sigma):
    result=(np.exp(1)**((((x-mu)/sigma)**2)/(-2)))/(sigma*np.sqrt(2*(math.pi)))
    return result
```
:::


::: {#8fe06a10 .cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
nomal_distribution_function(0, 3, 2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3}
```
np.float64(0.06475879783294587)
```
:::
:::


# 문제 2
파이썬 scipy 패키지 사용해서 다음과 같은 확률을 구하시오.
X ~ N(2, 3^2)
1) P(X < 3)
2) P(2 < X < 5)
3) P(X < 3 or X > 7)

::: {#65dda47d .cell execution_count=4}
``` {.python .cell-code}
from scipy.stats import bernoulli
from scipy.stats import binom
from scipy.stats import norm
```
:::


::: {#26c17536 .cell execution_count=5}
``` {.python .cell-code}
#1
norm.cdf(3, 2, 3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=5}
```
np.float64(0.6305586598182363)
```
:::
:::


::: {#5d4ca3da .cell execution_count=6}
``` {.python .cell-code}
#2
norm.cdf(5, 2, 3) - norm.cdf(2, 2, 3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=6}
```
np.float64(0.3413447460685429)
```
:::
:::


::: {#2e55f99c .cell execution_count=7}
``` {.python .cell-code}
#3
norm.cdf(3, 2, 3) + (1 - norm.cdf(7, 2, 3))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=7}
```
np.float64(0.678349012091051)
```
:::
:::


# 문제 3
LS 빅데이터 스쿨 학생들의 중간고사 점수는 평균이 30이고, 분산이 4인 정규분포를 따른다.
상위 5%에 해당하는 학생의 점수는?

::: {#3ba42a38 .cell execution_count=8}
``` {.python .cell-code}
norm.ppf(0.95, 30, 2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=8}
```
np.float64(33.28970725390295)
```
:::
:::
